meanings.definition: Restore (a deleted computer file) to its original state.
meanings.sent1: She undeletes the important document before the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He always undeletes his photos when he accidentally deletes them.
meanings.sent3: The computer magician undeletes the vanished files with a wave of his wand.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to undelete files is like bringing lost memories back to life.
meanings.sent5: With a few clicks, he undeletes the missing data as if it never disappeared.

meanings.definition: The action of restoring a deleted computer file.
meanings.sent1: The undeletes of the lost files saved the project from disaster.
meanings.sent2: He performed multiple undeletes to recover the corrupted files.
meanings.sent3: The office celebrated the successful undeletes with a cake.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for undeletes was praised by the entire team.
meanings.sent5: The undeletes of the missing documents brought relief to everyone involved.
